recipesJson.name: The Cookie Treat Conspiracy
recipesJson.author: Echodub
recipesJson.description:
A winter treat.
Creamy, sugar treated caramel cookies, fried with spices and cinnamon.
Suitable for wintertime, best in RTA's or flavor RDAs

reviews.text: I'm very much enjoying this recipe. It is quite a rich eggnog cookie. Flavor is very reminiscent of the holiday season to me. It isn't an ADV to me due to richness but is a great treat in my rda in the evenings with a cup of coffee. Well done.
